LandingPage.HeroTitle: Free Landing Page Template for startups
LandingPage.HeroSubtitle: Nextly is a free landing page & marketing website template for startups and indie projects. Its built with Next.js & TailwindCSS. And its completely open-source.
LandingPage.BenefitsTitle: Why should you use this landing page
LandingPage.BenefitsSubtitle: Nextly is a free landing page & marketing website template for startups and indie projects. Its built with Next.js & TailwindCSS. And its completely open-source.
LandingPage.BenefitOneSubtitle: You can use this space to highlight your first benefit or a feature of your product. It can also contain an image or Illustration like in the example along with some bullet points.
LandingPage.UnderstandCustomersDescription: Then explain the first point briefly in one or two lines.
LandingPage.ImproveAcquisitionDescription: Here you can add the next benefit point.
LandingPage.DriveCustomerRetentionDescription: This will be your last bullet point in this section.
LandingPage.BenefitTwoSubtitle: You can use this same layout with a flip image to highlight your rest of the benefits of your product. It can also contain an image or Illustration as above section along with some bullet points.
LandingPage.MobileResponsiveTemplateDescription: Nextly is designed as a mobile first responsive template.
LandingPage.PoweredByNextJSAndTailwindCSSDescription: This template is powered by latest technologies and tools.
LandingPage.DarkAndLightModeDescription: Nextly comes with a zero-config light & dark mode.
LandingPage.FAQDescription: Answer your customers possible questions here, it will increase the conversion rate as well as support or chat requests.
LandingPage.Question1: Is this template completely free to use?
LandingPage.Answer1: Yes, this template is completely free to use.
LandingPage.Question2: Can I use it in a commercial project?
LandingPage.Answer3: If you're unhappy with your purchase for any reason, email us within 90 days and we'll refund you in full, no questions asked.
LandingPage.Answer4: No, we don't offer technical support for free downloads. Please purchase a support plan to get 6 months of support.

Metadata.Title: Nextly - Free Nextjs & TailwindCSS Landing Page Template
Metadata.Description: Nextly is a free landing page template built with next.js & Tailwind CSS
